verbs.description: [ARG1: phoenix neighborhood] [V: put] [ARG2: on lockdown] [ARGM-CAU: due to suspicious package] a suspicious package caused a scare in phoenix tuesday night as people across the country remain on edge due to the serial bombings in austin fox 10 ty brennan reports phoenix police austin
